name: When I go outside || STOP THE WAR IN UKRAINE
name_original: When I go outside || STOP THE WAR IN UKRAINE
description:
Important changes are taking place in Russia right now. Not in politics, but in people's minds. Our society is gradually splitting into those who no longer trust the authorities and those who refuse to face the truth. And there are more and more people of the first type every day. 

The propagandists change their rhetoric, the population sees the consequences of the sanctions, and even those who believe the war is right are forced to admit that Russia is returning to the Stone Age.

We have passed the point of no return.

WAR IS A CRIME
